title: This is the outfit Zodwa Wabantu wears to mow her lawn
text:
This is the outfit Zodwa Wabantu wears to mow her lawn share this

Cape Town - Socialite Zodwa Wabantu is never shy to give us a glimpse into her carefree lifestyle. Now, she has shown us how she does her everyday chores – and as expected, it’s not conventional at all.

Zodwa shared a clip of herself mowing her lawn, wearing next to nothing after a night out. In true Zodwa style, she’s wearing her bra and undies which were covered with just lace kimono for the sun and high heels.

WATCH: Zodwa Wabantu's latest extreme beauty treatment for a 'popping' cleavage

Behind her seems to be the guy who is actually doing the mowing and not for the gram.

"I Sleep Drunk, Wake up with Duties Zodwa Wabantu [sic]," she captioned the clip.

Her gardening gear might not be recommended but Zodwa is not one to follow the rules.



Read more: Zodwa Wabantu undergoes vaginal rejuvenation surgery and shares experience on Instagram.

She underwent vaginal rejuvenation surgery which is meant to tighten the vagina and shared the experience on social media in the doctor’s room. She has ‘ironed out’ her body to rid it of cellulite. As if that was not enough, she has undergone another cosmetic procedure which will leave her breasts "popping".
